meanings.sent1: Stop lollygagging and finish your homework.
meanings.sent2: Don't lollygag around, we have work to do.
meanings.sent3: The cat likes to lollygag in the sun all day.
meanings.sent4: She lollygagged through life, never achieving her dreams.

meanings.sent2: He tends to lollygag when he should be working.
meanings.sent3: I caught him lollygagging instead of cleaning his room.
meanings.sent4: Time lollygagged by as she daydreamed at her desk.
meanings.sent5: The students lollygag in the hallway instead of going to class.

meanings.sent1: Stop lollygagging and make a decision.
